description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国务院总理和中共中央总书记，被视为中共党内改革派领袖。
description.en: A high-ranking politician in the People's Republic of China (PRC), who served as Premier of the People's Republic of China and General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 赵紫阳的夫人。
赵紫阳次子。
description.en: Second son of Zhao Ziyang.

description.zh-cn: 赵紫阳之女，中国嘉德国际拍卖有限公司总经理。
description.en: Daughter of Zhao Ziyang, General Manager of China Guardian Auctions.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary and statesman who served as the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China from December 1978 to November 1989.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在中国的一场由学生主导的民主运动，最终以武力清场告终。
description.en: Student-led demonstrations held in Tiananmen Square, Beijing during 1989, which ended with a military crackdown.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的主要负责人，也是中国共产党中央书记处的首脑。
曾任中共中央主席和中共中央总书记，是改革开放早期平反冤假错案和真理标准大讨论的具体执行者。
曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理和全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长。
description.en: Served as the fourth Premier of the People's Republic of China and the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十三届中央委员会第四次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十三届中央委员会第四次全体会议
en: Fourth Plenary Session of the 13th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 此次会议审议并通过了关于赵紫阳在“六四事件”中所犯错误的报告，并撤销其党内职务。
由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，曾在广东担任主要领导职务。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，改革开放初期在安徽推行农村改革。
中华人民共和国的一项以经济建设为中心，对内改革、对外开放的国策。
曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
曾任赵紫阳的政治秘书。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，被视为党内保守派的代表人物。
中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国主席。

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央军事委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席、中华人民共和国国务院总理。
美国第40任总统。
description.en: 40th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国经济学家，诺贝尔经济学奖得主。
description.en: American economist who received the 1976 Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 苏联最后一任最高领导人，曾任苏共中央总书记。
description.en: The last leader of the Soviet Union, serving as General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 曾任英国首相。
description.en: Served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 赵二军是赵紫阳的次子。
description.en: Zhao Erjun is the second son of Zhao Ziyang.

description.zh-cn: 王雁南是赵紫阳的女儿。
description.en: Wang Yannan is the daughter of Zhao Ziyang.

position.zh-cn: 中央委员会总书记、中央委员会副主席、中央政治局常委、广东省委第一书记、四川省委第一书记等
position.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee, Vice Chairman of the Central Committee, Member of the Politburo Standing Committee, First Secretary of Guangdong Provincial Committee, First Secretary of Sichuan Provincial Committee, etc.

description.zh-cn: 因在六四事件中同情学生并反对武力镇压，被免去党内外一切领导职务，并遭受长期软禁。
description.en: Due to his sympathy for students and opposition to the armed crackdown during the Tiananmen Square protests, he was stripped of all leadership positions inside and outside the party and placed under long-term house arrest.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十三届中央委员会第四次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 会议通过报告，撤销了赵紫阳担任的中共中央总书记、中央政治局常委、中央政治局委员、中央军委第一副主席等职务。
description.en: The plenum passed a report that removed Zhao Ziyang from his posts as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Politburo Standing Committee member, Politburo member, and First Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 在处理六四事件的方式上发生严重分歧，赵紫阳主张对话与和解，反对武力镇压，而邓小平最终决定实施戒严和武力清场。
description.en: Had serious disagreements on how to handle the Tiananmen Square protests. Zhao advocated for dialogue and reconciliation, opposing a military crackdown, while Deng ultimately decided to impose martial law and use force.

description.zh-cn: 在处理六四事件的方式上存在激烈交锋，李鹏主张强硬镇压，并在中共十三届四中全会上作报告指责赵紫阳分裂党和支持动乱。
description.en: Clashed fiercely over the handling of the Tiananmen Square protests. Li Peng advocated for a hardline crackdown and later delivered a report at the 4th Plenary Session of the 13th Central Committee accusing Zhao of splitting the party and supporting the turmoil.

description.zh-cn: 陈云是党内保守派的代表人物，与赵紫阳在治国理念和改革方针上存在分歧。
description.en: Chen Yun, a representative of the party's conservative faction, had disagreements with Zhao Ziyang on governance philosophy and reform policies.

description.zh-cn: 李先念是党内保守派，与赵紫阳在治国理念上存在分歧，并在中共十三大后公开攻击赵紫阳。
description.en: Li Xiannian, a party conservative, disagreed with Zhao Ziyang's governance philosophy and publicly attacked him after the 13th Party Congress.

description.zh-cn: 作为国务院总理和中共中央总书记，赵紫阳是中国经济体制改革的实际组织者和领导者，大力发展市场经济并积极推进政治体制改革。
description.en: As Premier and General Secretary, Zhao Ziyang was the de facto organizer and leader of China's economic system reform, vigorously developing a market economy and actively promoting political system reform.

description.zh-cn: 文革期间，赵紫阳作为“陶铸在广东的代理人”被打倒，遭到迫害和审查，后被下放工厂劳动。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Zhao Ziyang was purged as 'Tao Zhu's agent in Guangdong', subjected to persecution and investigation, and later sent to work in a factory.

description.zh-cn: 陶铸是赵紫阳在广东时期的直接上级和政治盟友，其思想和工作作风对赵紫阳产生了深远影响。
description.en: Tao Zhu was Zhao Ziyang's direct superior and political ally in Guangdong, and his ideology and work style had a profound influence on Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 两人分别在四川和安徽推行农村改革，遥相呼应，民间有“要吃粮找紫阳，要吃米找万里”的说法，是改革派的重要盟友。
description.en: They implemented rural reforms in Sichuan and Anhui respectively, supporting each other's efforts. A popular saying was 'Turn to Ziyang for grain, turn to Wan Li for rice.' They were important allies in the reformist faction.

description.zh-cn: 在1980年代共同作为改革派核心人物，合作推进中国的改革开放和一系列政治改革。
description.en: As key figures of the reformist faction in the 1980s, they collaborated to advance China's reform and opening-up and a series of political reforms.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院
中国共产党中央军事委员会
中华人民共和国中央军事委员会
中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 1987年1月16日至11月2日为代理总书记。
description.en: Served as acting General Secretary from January 16 to November 2, 1987.

position.en: Director of the General Office of the Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 在赵紫阳担任总书记期间，温家宝任中共中央办公厅主任，曾陪同赵紫阳前往天安门广场。
description.en: While Zhao was General Secretary, Wen served as Director of the General Office of the Central Committee and accompanied Zhao to Tiananmen Square.

description.zh-cn: 以中国总理身份对美国进行为期一周的访问期间会面。
description.en: Met during a week-long visit to the United States as Premier of China.

description.zh-cn: 在北京会面，讨论中国经济改革问题。
description.en: Met in Beijing to discuss China's economic reforms.

description.zh-cn: 在北京会见来访的苏共中央总书记戈尔巴乔夫。
description.en: Met with the visiting General Secretary of the CPSU, Mikhail Gorbachev, in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 代表中国政府与英国首相撒切尔夫人在北京签署《中英联合声明》。
description.en: Representing the Chinese government, signed the Sino-British Joint Declaration with British Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher in Beijing.
